# Auth Admin API

## About

This is the backend API for the authentication administration user interface

## Project structure

The API is used by the authentication administration user interface, but shares services and database with the backend API for the authentication server ([auth-api](https://docs.devland.is/apps/services/auth/ids-api)).

[![](https://mermaid.-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#-)

## URLs

- Dev: N/A
- Staging: N/A
- Production: N/A

## Getting started

To run the API locally, you first need to start the database container:

```bash
yarn dev-services services-auth-ids-api
```

Then run the migration and seed scripts:

```bash
yarn nx run services-auth-ids-api:migrate
yarn nx run services-auth-ids-api:seed
```

Finally, start the service:

```bash
yarn start services-auth-admin-api
```
